content.raw: Hmm, I might’ve made a mistake with testing and just ensured that multiple selection from entity tree works without testing the align tool.  I just went down a rabbit hole of reducing logic and found that we can remove the `sendEvent` boolean completely and the behavior \(seemingly\) remains the same.  \(Really sorry for creating another PR, but I think it’ll be quick\) Can you look at the fix [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/582/remove-select-entity-from-selection-helper) when you get a chance?  I think this resolves the issue without a hacky fix.
